intro: Pasania shinsuiensis, commonly known as the Shinsui pasania, is a species of flowering plant native to Japan. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale pink in color. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endemic species.
